languages.text: "М? Спесивая дрянь решила, что я якшаюсь с мон-кай? Лучше бы я не оставлял ее смерть тебе, а сам вырезал ее сердце. Впрочем, подметить мой интерес к твоей персоне было весьма прозорливо — особенно для безмозглой ведьмы с арены".

"Mm? The pompous waste of skin thought that I would associate with mon-keigh? I wish I did not leave her death to you and instead cut out her heart myself. Still, to take note of my interest in your person was quite perceptive — even more so for a brainless arena Wych."
languages.original_text: "М? Спесивая дрянь решила, что я якшаюсь с мон-кай? Лучше бы я не оставлял ее смерть тебе, а сам вырезал ее сердце. Впрочем, подметить мой интерес к твоей персоне было весьма прозорливо — особенно для безмозглой ведьмы с арены".

traits.locale_text: "Mm? The pompous waste of skin thought that I associate with mon-keigh? I wish I did not leave her death to you and instead cut out her heart myself. Still, to take note of my interest in your person was quite perceptive — even more so for a brainless arena Wych."

"Mm? The pompous waste of skin thought that I associate with mon-keigh? I wish I did not leave her death to you and instead cut out her heart myself. Still, to take note of my interest in your person was quite perceptive — even more so for a brainless arena Wych."

"Mm? The pompous waste of skin thought that I would associate with mon-keigh? I wish I did not leave her death to you and instead cut out her heart myself. Still, to take note of my interest in your person was quite perceptive — even more so for a brainless arena Wych."

"Mm? The pompous waste of skin thought that I would associate with mon-keigh? I wish I did not leave her death to you and instead cut out her heart myself. Still, to take note of my interest in your person was quite perceptive — even more so for a brainless arena Wych."

languages.text: 「ん？あの横柄な出来損ないめが、俺がモン＝ケイの仲間だと？お前に任せずにこの手で直々に始末すれば良かったと今になって悔やまれる。いずれにせよ、俺がお前に興味を持っていることを見抜いたとはな。あのように無能なアリーナのウィッチにしては、なかなか鋭い洞察力だ」
languages.original_text: "Mm? The pompous waste of skin thought that I would associate with mon-keigh? I wish I did not leave her death to you and instead cut out her heart myself. Still, to take note of my interest in your person was quite perceptive — even more so for a brainless arena Wych."

traits.locale_text: 「ん？あの横柄な出来損ないめが、俺がモン＝ケイの仲間だと？お前に任せずにこの手で直々に始末すれば良かったと今になって悔やまれる。いずれにせよ、俺がお前に興味を持っていることを見抜いたとはな。あのように無能なアリーナのウィッチにしては、なかなか鋭い洞察力だ」

languages.text: “嗯？那个愚蠢的废物，居然会以为我会与猴子为伍？我真希望我当时没有把她交给你来了断，而是亲手挖出她的心脏。不过，她居然能注意到我对你的个人兴趣，她的观察力还不错。对不长脑子的巫灵而言，这还真是挺了不起。”
languages.original_text: "Mm? The pompous waste of skin thought that I would associate with mon-keigh? I wish I did not leave her death to you and instead cut out her heart myself. Still, to take note of my interest in your person was quite perceptive — even more so for a brainless arena Wych."

traits.locale_text: “嗯？那个愚蠢的废物，居然会以为我会与猴子为伍？我真希望我当时没有把她交给你来了断，而是亲手挖出她的心脏。不过，她居然能注意到我对你的个人兴趣，她的观察力还不错。对不长脑子的巫灵而言，这还真是挺了不起。”

languages.text: «¿Mmm? ¿Ese despojo inútil pensaba que me asociaría con los mon-keigh? Ahora lamento haber dejado su muerte en tus manos y no haberle arrancado yo el corazón. Sin embargo, si se fijó en mi interés por ti es que era más perceptiva de lo normal. Especialmente para una Bruja descerebrada de la arena».
languages.original_text: "Mm? The pompous waste of skin thought that I would associate with mon-keigh? I wish I did not leave her death to you and instead cut out her heart myself. Still, to take note of my interest in your person was quite perceptive — even more so for a brainless arena Wych."

traits.locale_text: «¿Mmm? ¿Ese despojo inútil pensaba que me asociaría con los mon-keigh? Ahora lamento haber dejado su muerte en tus manos y no haberle arrancado yo el corazón. Sin embargo, si se fijó en mi interés por ti es que era más perceptiva de lo normal. Especialmente para una Bruja descerebrada de la arena».

languages.text: « Hmm ? Cette petite prétentieuse croyait que je m'abaisserais à m'allier à {mf|un|une} mon-keigh ? Je regrette de ne pas lui avoir arraché le cœur moi-même au lieu de vous laisser la tuer. Je dois tout de même reconnaître qu'elle s'est montrée assez perspicace pour remarquer l'intérêt que je vous porte. Impressionnant, pour une Céraste d'arène sans cervelle. »
languages.original_text: "Mm? The pompous waste of skin thought that I would associate with mon-keigh? I wish I did not leave her death to you and instead cut out her heart myself. Still, to take note of my interest in your person was quite perceptive — even more so for a brainless arena Wych."

traits.locale_text: « Hmm ? Cette petite prétentieuse croyait que je m'abaisserais à m'allier à {mf|un|une} mon-keigh ? Je regrette de ne pas lui avoir arraché le cœur moi-même au lieu de vous laisser la tuer. Je dois tout de même reconnaître qu'elle s'est montrée assez perspicace pour remarquer l'intérêt que je vous porte. Impressionnant, pour une Céraste d'arène sans cervelle. »

languages.text: "Hm? Diese eingebildete Verschwendung von Haut dachte, ich würde mich mit einem Chem-Pan-Sey zusammentun? Ich hätte ihren Tod nicht Euch überlassen, sondern Ihr das Herz eigenhändig herausschneiden sollen. Andererseits hat sie immerhin mein Interesse an Eurer Person wahrgenommen – nicht schlecht für eine hirnlose Arena-Hekatari."
languages.original_text: "Mm? The pompous waste of skin thought that I would associate with mon-keigh? I wish I did not leave her death to you and instead cut out her heart myself. Still, to take note of my interest in your person was quite perceptive — even more so for a brainless arena Wych."

traits.locale_text: "Hm? Diese eingebildete Verschwendung von Haut dachte, ich würde mich mit einem Chem-Pan-Sey zusammentun? Ich hätte ihren Tod nicht Euch überlassen, sondern Ihr das Herz eigenhändig herausschneiden sollen. Andererseits hat sie immerhin mein Interesse an Eurer Person wahrgenommen – nicht schlecht für eine hirnlose Arena-Hekatari."

languages.text: "Ha? O küstah kımıl zararlısı, bir mon-keigh'le aynı yolu yürüyeceğimi mi düşünmüş? Keşke onu kendi ellerimle gebertebilseydim. Yine de sana olan ilgimi görebilmesi oldukça şaşırtıcı. Aptal bir arena Viç'i olduğunu hesaba kattığımızda daha da şaşırtıcı oluyor."
languages.original_text: "Mm? The pompous waste of skin thought that I would associate with mon-keigh? I wish I did not leave her death to you and instead cut out her heart myself. Still, to take note of my interest in your person was quite perceptive — even more so for a brainless arena Wych."

traits.locale_text: "Ha? O küstâh kımıl zararlısı, bir mon-keighle aynı yolu yürüyeceğimi mi düşünmüş? Keşke onu kendi ellerimle gebertebilseydim. Yine de sana olan ilgimi görebilmesi oldukça şaşırtıcı. Aptal bir arena Viçi olduğunu hesaba katarsak çok daha şaşırtıcı oluyor."
